BREAST-COMPOSITION: fibro fatty and glandular breast parenchyma (ACR C)
FINDINGS: A small, well-defined, round soft opacity with smooth margins is seen in the upper outer quadrant of the left breast. No significant calcifications are noted within this opacity. The lesion appears benign but requires short-term follow-up to confirm stability. Skin, nipple, and pectoral muscle appear normal. No significant axillary adenopathy observed.
